message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent share.  Let's see if we can make this work!
I'll take a smaller share now, but I'm hoping to negotiate a better deal later on. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money more evenly this time. If we keep rejecting each other, we'll both lose out in the end.
I'm starting to think we're not going to come to an agreement. I'll offer a 50/50 split, but I'm not getting any younger...
